mapper.insert: insert into process_instance (id, process_id, biz_no, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, process_id, biz_no, create_time, modified_time from process_instance
mapper.insert: insert into process_instance (id, process_id, biz_no, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
